title: "Retail Vending Machine Market is Likely to Advance at a CAGR of 9% During the Forecast Period 2033 | FMI"
excerpt: "By 2033, the retail vending machine market is projected to have grown from its anticipated US$ 60 billion in 2023 to US$ 143 billion. Throughout the projection period, the use of retail vending machines is anticipated to grow at a CAGR of 9%."
